Eleana Little, Ward E - City of Jersey City

Jersey City

Eleana Little, Ward E

Contact Info
------------

* phone(201) 547-5315
* 280 Grove Street  
  Room 207  
  Jersey City, NJ 07302
* [Directions](https://www.google.com/maps/place/280+Grove+St,+Jersey+City,+NJ+07302/@40.717734,-74.0452787,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89c250b1c0f830e5:0x2eded41122dc4d04!8m2!3d40.717734!4d-74.04309)

| ![Generic Person](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Image/City%20Hall/City%20Council/2026%20Council/President/Generic%20Person_USE%20AdobeStock_227477072.png "Generic Person") | Ward E Councilperson Eleana Little **Term of Office:  First Elected To Council: Dec. 2, 2025   Current Term Expires: January 14, 2030    (201) 547-5315  [ELittle@jcnj.org](mailto:ELittle@jcnj.org)    Council Aide: Grace Perez  (201) 547-5283  [GPerez@jcnj.org](mailto:GPerez@jcnj.org)** |

**Biography**   
Eleana Little is a neighbor with progressive values and a passion for public service. Prior to her election, Eleana was an active community advocate in downtown Jersey City, serving as President of the Harsimus Cove Association. Professionally, Eleana is an environmental engineer with degrees from Rutgers University and UC Berkeley and a decade of experience across both the public and private sectors. Originally from Central Jersey, she first moved to Jersey City 12 years ago, and currently lives in downtown Jersey City with her fiancé and their two dogs. She is honored to have the opportunity to serve the people of Jersey City on the City Council.

![Jersey City](https://cdnsm5-hosted.civiclive.com/UserFiles/Servers/Server_6189660/Image/logo/white-logo.png)

Jersey City, New Jersey
